sect2.title: Messagebox
sect2.para: It provides a set of utilities to show message boxes.
It is typically used to alert users when an error occurs, or to prompt user for an decision.
Messagebox.show("Question is pressed. Are you sure?", "Question", Messagebox.OK | Messagebox.CANCEL, Messagebox.QUESTION);
